Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Avenue/Hoyne
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Western, Division, Damen and North Avenue, due to street blockage near North Avenue/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Western, Division, Damen, then resume their normal route on North Avenue, due to street blockage near North Avenue/Hoyne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
